articles.description: Dallas has holes to fill on the offensive line, but history suggests it's fully capable of doing so via the draft.
articles.content:
FRISCO, Texas -- It is a good year to need an offensive lineman when it comes to the NFL draft, so the Dallas Cowboys have that going for them.
Another thing going for them: a track record of succes… [+5681 chars]
